info.name: Contact360 API
info.description:
Complete GraphQL API collection for Contact360 Appointment service. Includes all 25 modules with queries and mutations.

**ðŸ“š For comprehensive module documentation**, see docs/GraphQL/README.md which includes detailed queries, mutations, validation rules, error handling, and implementation details for each module.

**Setup Instructions:**
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Create/import environment with baseUrl variable
3. Use Auth > Login or Register to get access token
4. Token will be automatically saved to environment
5. All other requests will use the saved token
